title: Mobile Learning-Based Career Guidance Program Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in smartphone usage and foundational understanding of career exploration
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centered learning design considering PC-unavailable environments, linked to science career pathways

learning_goals: Learners can categorize career exploration processes into three or more stages using mobile applications.
Learners can analyze five or more scientific career cases provided in the application and connect them to their fields of interest.
Learners can complete at least 70% of action plans for career planning using mobile learning tools without time/location constraints.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
